Channel.Description: Battery status CPU (0 = battery low or missing, 1 = battery ok)

Indication for proper cyclic operation (1 = operational)
Indication for a synchronized POWERLINK-system (1 = synchronized)

Network time offset to local system time [µs]
Unoccupied time during one POWERLINK cycle [µs]

Extended status word (1 = Access to the EEPROM non-volatile memory in progress)
Extended status word (0 = No parameter consistency check; 1 = Parameter consistency check)
Extended status word (0 = The drive is not in fault state or a fault is detected; 1 = The drive is in fault state but the fault is no longer present (not reset))
Extended status word (1 = The drive is in speed mode)
Extended status word (0 = Drive in steady state; 1 = Drive in transient state)
Extended status word (1 = Motor thermal state threshold reached for the active motor)
Extended status word (1 = Acceleration in progress)
Extended status word (1 = Deceleration in progress)
Extended status word (1 = Current limit in progress)
Extended status word (1 = Fast stop in progress)

Extended status word (bit 13 = 0 and bit 14 = 0 : Drive controled by terminal or local keypad; bit 13 = 1 and bit 14 = 0 : Drive controled by remote keypad; bit 13 = 0 and bit 14 = 1 : Drive controled by Modbus; bit 13 = 1 and bit 14 = 1 : Drive controled by X2X)

Extended status word (bit 13 = 0 and bit 14 = 0 : Drive controled by terminal or local keypad; bit 13 = 1 and bit 14 = 0 : Drive controled by remote keypad; bit 13 = 0 and bit 14 = 1 : Drive controled by Modbus; bit 13 = 1 and bit 14 = 1 : Drive controled by X2X)
Extended status word (0 = Forward operation applied before the ramp; 1 = Reverse operation applied before the ramp)
Extended control word (1 = Factory setting command)
Extended control word (1 = Save configuration to EEPROM non-volatile memory command)
External fault (1 = The drive's behaviour during an external fault is defined by EPL)
Ramp switching command (0 = No action; 1 = Ramp switching command)
Definition of the frequency reference(LFr) and output frequency(rFr) unit (0 = 0.1 hz; 1 = Standardized value 16 signed bits based on the maximum frequency)
Drive locked on standstill (0 = Drive not locked on standstill; 1 = Drive locked on standstill)
Parameter consistency check (0 = Check is activated; 1 = Check is deactivated)
